name: Storybook Documentation Standards
description: Standards for creating consistent Storybook documentation across design system components

componentDescription.description: Clear, concise description of component purpose and functionality

features.description: List of key features with bold headers and brief descriptions

propsTable.description: Markdown table documenting all component props

types.name: With Custom Styling
types.description: Usage with sx props for styling

stylingSection.description: Explanation of how to customize different parts
stylingSection.format: Bold headers for each customizable area

principles.language: Use French for descriptions (following project conventions)
principles.flexibility: Show different use cases and configurations
principles.consistency: Use consistent formatting and naming conventions
principles.completeness: Include all major props with clear descriptions
principles.patterns: Show both simple and complex usage patterns

codeQuality.typescript: Use proper TypeScript syntax in examples
codeQuality.imports: Show proper import statements when relevant
